ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Artist just stood there, looking at the enemies. Artost fired at a random newcomer before standing again. The Radicons walked outside the base and got ready

Artist just stood there, looking at the enemies. Artost fired at a random
newcomer before standing again. The Radicons walked outside the base and got
ready for some battle. Arrow fired an arrow at a random member of the
newcomers, Stronghold punched Airbomber by mistake. Scamrock grabbed a rock
and swung it, but he accidentally hit Stranato! Stranato sits up and looks
into Scamrock's eyes and they try to stare each other down. Train Wreck
fires at a random member of the newcomers...
----- Original Message -----
From: <KSLawdogg@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Saturday, June 17, 2000 3:35 AM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> Bumblebee/Double Punch/Injector/Manterror/Counter Punch/The
Oblitercons/Koga
> Shuko/Unitron/Hades/Anubis/Serpentor/Nemesis Enforcer:
>
>
>
>
> Shuko laughed.  "Y...y...you're the great Liono Prime?!" he bent over in a
> riot, laughing like Hell.  "So pathetic and stupid, hehe, we'll win!" he
> yelled, the blast sending him landing on his skid plate.
> ---
>
> Unitron chuckled, diving down, he targeted Key, firing two missiles, one
from
> each wing, at the female Maximal, a burst of 20 rapid lasers flashing out
at
> Liono's back.
>
> ---
>
> Anubis twirled throuh the air as he was hit by Tigerhawk's blasts, landing
on
> his knees.  Raising his launcher, he fired a rocket off at Tigerhawk.
>
> ---
>
> Hades, got in behind the other Maximals, firing five laser bolts at
> Tigerhawk's back, an optic blast at Liono's back.
>
> ---
>
> Most of the Predacons (Double Punch, Counter Punch, Manterror, Injector,
and
> Bumblebee) assembled as they saw the Maximals retreating,  Giving chase
after
> the Maximals, Dark One had been chasing, they chuckled.  They would finish
> it...tonight.
>
> ---
>
> Both punching, Nemesis went flying backwards through the air, slamming to
the
> ground from 30 ft up.  At the same time, Nemesis' punch sent Serpentor
> slamming to the ground downwards.  Both getting up quickly,
> Anubis twirled througSerpentor tackled Nemesis, two swift punches
followed.
> Raising his rapid laser rifle, he fired twenty blasts.  Ten at Blue
Stinger,
> ten at Antagony.  Turning his head, an uppercut from Nemesis sent him to
the
> ground on his back.
>
> ---
>
> The Oblitercons, all in their vehicle modes except for Hiss, and minus
Dark
> One, exited into the clearing where the Maximals and Newcomers were,
> chuckling madly.
>
